propDescriptions.actions: A ref with imperative actions. It allows to select the first or last menu item.
propDescriptions.anchorEl: An HTML element, virtualElement, or a function that returns either. It's used to set the position of the popper.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.onOpenChange: Triggered when focus leaves the menu and the menu should close.
propDescriptions.open: Controls whether the menu is displayed.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside the Menu.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside the Menu. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component. See Slots API below for more details.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

expanded.nodeName: the root `Popper` element and the listbox `ul` element

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.listbox: The component that renders the listbox.
